snippet: Mt. Gox, once the largest Bitcoin exchange in the world, said its problems had been caused by a previously undetected glitch in the basic Bitcoin protocol that made it possible for users to falsify transactions.
abstract: Mt. Gox, once the largest Bitcoin exchange in the world, said its problems had been caused by a previously undetected glitch in the basic Bitcoin protocol that made it possible for users to falsify transactions.

headline.main: Daily Report: Software Error Shakes Bitcoin Exchange
